payMore.title: Why Join the GTC Demo Trading Competition?
payMore.intro: You're not just entering a trading competition, you're stepping into the trading spotlight! Here‚Äôs why traders from all over the world are registering and can‚Äôt wait to compete in GTC‚Äôs first-ever demo trading tournament:

feature1.title: $3,000 Goes To The Winner + Zero Risk!

feature2.title: Test Your Skills on Real Market Conditions
feature2.description: This is your chance to prove you‚Äôre the best when it comes to trading in live market conditions, plus it‚Äôs completely risk free!

feature3.title: Leaderboard That Shows You‚Äôre Really the Best!
feature3.description: See how you really stack up against other traders worldwide. The leaderboard updates daily & your performance does the talking.

feature4.title: Trade Your Way When Competing with Other Traders
feature4.description: Trade your way in the demo trading competition with 1:500 leverage. Trade Forex, Metals & Commodities in the demo competition.

feature5.title: Gain the Ultimate Recognition Plus the Rewards!

feature6.title: Absolutely Perfect for New & Experienced Traders
feature6.description: Whether you're brand new to trading or already seasoned, this is the ideal no-risk opportunity to grow, compete & get rewarded.

work.heading: How the GTC Demo Trading Competition Works

detail.title: Demo Trading Competition Details

content: You‚Äôll have 14 full days to trade your way up the leaderboard.

competitionDetails.title: How to Participate
content: Simply click here to access the registration form. When you fill in the form, here‚Äôs what will happen:
list: You‚Äôll get your $10,000 GTC MT5 Demo Account with login credentials via email.
You‚Äôll be able to trade FX, Metals & Commodities during the contest period.
You‚Äôll be able to track your progress on the live leaderboard in GTC VIP, our loyalty rewards platform. Check it out!

meta.title: Privacy Policy ‚Äì GTC | Regulated Forex & CFD Broker
meta.description: Read GTCFX‚Äôs Privacy Policy to learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal data across our regulated platforms in Vanuatu, Mauritius, and UAE.

header.title: Privacy Policy
header.subtitle: Protecting your information across all GTC platforms and subdomains

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.intro1: This Privacy Policy applies to GTC, including all of its subdomains such as reg.gtcfx.com (and all other GTC-related subdomains), and covers how we handle your personal information.
whoWeAre.intro2: When we say ‚ÄúGTC,‚Äù ‚ÄúGTCFX,‚Äù ‚ÄúGTC VIP,‚Äù ‚Äúwe,‚Äù ‚Äúour,‚Äù or ‚Äúus,‚Äù we‚Äôre referring to:

entity1.title: GTC Global Trade Capital Co. Ltd
entity1.line1: Authorised by the Vanuatu Financial Services Commission (VFSC).
entity1.line3: Address: 1st Floor, B&P House, Kumul Highway, Port Vila, Vanuatu.

entity2.title: GTC Global Ltd
entity2.line1: Authorised by the Financial Services Commission of Mauritius.
entity2.line3: Address: The Cyberati Lounge, Ground Floor, The Catalyst, 40 Cybercity, 72201 Ebene, Mauritius.

ourCommitment.title: Our Commitment
ourCommitment.description: At GTC, your privacy isn‚Äôt just a checkbox, it‚Äôs a priority. We‚Äôre committed to protecting your personal data and being fully transparent about how it‚Äôs collected, used, and safeguarded across all our domains.

point.four: Your rights and how to exercise them

personalData.title: The Personal Data We Collect
personalData.intro: When you interact with GTC ‚Äì whether through opening an account, visiting our site, or signing up on any of our landing pages, we may collect:

items.one: Full name, date and place of birth, gender, and nationality.
items.two: Contact details: email, phone number, residential address.

items.one: Financial info: bank details, source of funds, trading history.
items.two: Identity documents: passport, driving licence, national ID.
items.four: IP address, device info, cookies, and platform usage.

personalData.note: We may also record phone calls and chat conversations for compliance and training.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.description: We only use your data when we have a lawful reason to do so.

points.one: To provide services ‚Äì So we can set up and manage your trading account.
points.two: To meet legal obligations ‚Äì Including anti-money laundering and regulatory requirements.
points.three: To protect our business interests ‚Äì Like improving our platforms, analysing user behaviour, and managing risk.
points.four: With your consent ‚Äì For email marketing and exclusive webinar invites.
points.five: For customer support ‚Äì To help you with requests or resolve issues.
points.six: To improve our website experience ‚Äì Using cookies, geolocation, and session tracking.
points.seven: To keep records ‚Äì For auditing, legal, and tax reasons.

howWeUse.footer: We‚Äôll never sell your data. Period.

whoWeShare.title: Who We Share Your Data With
whoWeShare.description: Your data may be shared with:

items.one: Other GTC entities (e.g. regulated arms in Vanuatu and Mauritius).
items.two: Payment providers and identity verification services.
items.three: Legal, compliance, and financial service partners.
items.four: Regulatory authorities, when required by law.
items.five: Marketing tools (but never for third-party marketing).

whoWeShare.footer: We only share data on a need-to-know basis and make sure any third party meets strict data protection standards.

cookiesTracking.title: Cookies & Tracking
cookiesTracking.description: We use cookies and tracking tech on all GTCFX domains (e.g. https://gtcfx.com, https://gtcvip.com, etc.) to:
cookiesTracking.footer: You can manage your cookie settings in your browser. For more info, see our

internationalTransfers.title: International Transfers
internationalTransfers.description: Because we operate globally, your data might be processed outside the EEA. Whenever we do this, we make sure your data is just as safe as it would be under EU laws, using safeguards like GDPR-compliant contracts.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.description: Here‚Äôs what you‚Äôre entitled to under data protection laws:

points.three: Request deletion if we no longer need it.
points.six: Request transfer of your data to another provider.
points.seven: Object to marketing or data profiling.

yourRights.footer: To exercise any of these rights, email:

one.text: For as long as your account is active.

two.text: For at least 5 years after closing your account, to meet AML and regulatory obligations.

three.text: Longer if required for legal, tax, or dispute purposes.

dataSafety.title: Keeping Your Data Safe
dataSafety.description: We store your data in secure servers, limit staff access, and train our team regularly on data protection. We also use encryption, access controls, and strict monitoring to keep your data protected.

policyUpdates.title: Updates to This Policy
policyUpdates.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any updates will be posted on gtcfx.com and across relevant subdomains.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Questions? Need help with your data rights?
